ui.title: ETF calculator – simple explanation
ui.methodIntro: We calculate month by month: first the interest on the current balance, then we add your contribution. If an interest tax applies, we subtract it right away. If you choose a dynamic increase, your contribution rises each year.
ui.monthlyRateDesc: As a simple approximation, we take: annual rate divided by 12.
ui.interestGainDesc: The monthly interest gain is based on your current balance. If tax applies, we subtract a portion immediately.
ui.monthStepDesc: We add in order: first the interest gain, then your contribution. For yearly contributions, it occurs only in month 12.
ui.dynamicDesc: The contribution increases each year by the specified percentage.
ui.roundingNote: Values are rounded to 2 decimal places.
